title: 2020-11-19 - APT Exploits Microsoft Zerologon Bug- Targets Japanese Companies
plain_text:
# APT Exploits Microsoft Zerologon Bug: Targets Japanese Companies

**[threatpost.com/apt-exploits-zerologon-targets-japanese-companies/161383/](https://threatpost.com/apt-exploits-zerologon-targets-japanese-companies/161383/)**

## Subscribe to our Threatpost Today newsletter

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)
